summary: The conflict between Israel and Hamas-led Palestinian groups began in October 2023, with a surprise attack by Hamas. This led to a deadly war, with over 40,000 Palestinian deaths and massive destruction in Gaza. Israel launched a destructive bombing campaign and invaded Gaza, resulting in the displacement of nearly all 2.3 million Palestinians there. The war has had global repercussions, with large pro-Palestinian protests and international accusations of genocide against Israel. As of February 2024, the war continues, with Israel receiving military aid from the US and facing accusations of war crimes.
title: Israelâ€“Hamas war
